r.d: Net_SMPP is an implementation of the SMPP (Short Message Peer-to-Peer) v3.4 protocol. SMPP is an open protocol used in the wireless industry to send and recieve SMS messages. Net_SMPP does not provide a SMPP client or server, but they can easily be built with it.
r.n: - Initial PEAR release. - Conform to PEAR package directory structure. - Add example. - Remove old vendor code from PDU::statusDesc().
